dishes.weight_calculation_method: Phase2 Gemini visual estimation: 180.0g (Strategy: dish_level, Phase2 decision)
dishes.reason_for_strategy: Meatloaf is a well-known prepared dish. While direct 'Meatloaf' SR Legacy entries were not ideal, FDC 169474 (Beef, ground, 70% lean meat / 30% fat, loaf, cooked, baked) is an SR Legacy entry that accurately describes the primary cooked form of the meatloaf. This provides a more accurate representation than attempting to break down the complex meatloaf into basic ingredients, which would miss its composite nature. The ketchup is a distinct topping, so it is included as an ingredient.
dishes.usda_source_description: Beef, ground, 70% lean meat / 30% fat, loaf, cooked, baked
dishes.reason_for_choice: This SR Legacy entry provides the most compositionally accurate representation for the main body of the meatloaf, describing a cooked ground beef loaf. It is preferred over branded options or less specific SR Legacy entries.

ingredients.reason_for_choice: A suitable branded FDC for ketchup, which is a visible and distinct topping on the meatloaf.
